entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Malbaie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Pocatière 4:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
